item.description:
@tylerrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr wrote:

djmeadows88:

if thats your cache, then yes

soo what ur saying is that i change this:

public URL getCodeBase() { try { return new URL("http://127.0.0.1/cache"); } catch (Exception e) { return super.getCodeBase(); } }

to…

public URL getCodeBase() { try { return new URL("http://lost-legacy.erotic-moments.nl/LostLegacy.zip"); } catch (Exception e) { return super.getCodeBase(); } }
?

item.title: Webclient PI help. not tht much to answer
item.dc:creator: @tylerrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr tylerrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr
item.description:
@tylerrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr wrote:

OK well i downloaded this server + client and do i need to worry about this:

public URL getCodeBase() { try { return new URL("http://127.0.0.1/cache"); } catch (Exception e) { return super.getCodeBase(); } }

Because i want my server to be online for everyone and since it says “127.0.0.1” i think the webclient is only going to work for me. so… any suggestions?

Read full topic
